cause.description:
Im fed up with people who cheat at sports. not just airsoft but all sports. so if u want to start a Devils Children ___Team go on ahead
i just need money to get better equipment so i have a way to beat cheaters and donate airsoft gunz to players
1. I believe cheaters should never win
2. I believe winners should never cheat
3. I believe Cheaters should be abolished
cause.mission: make a team that will destroy all the teams that cheat
cause.name: Devils children airsoft team
